vernac_cmds: Definition palin_G : cfg := (StartG, (StartG, []) :: flat_map (fun g => [ (StartG, [g]); (StartG, [g; StartG; g]) ]) Sigma).
Lemma notInZero (x: nat) A : not (x el A) <-> count A x = 0.
Lemma G_left x : rewt palin_G [StartG] x -> rev x = x /\ count x StartG <= 1.
assert (count x StartG = 0) as H1 % notInZero by omega.
assert (count y0 StartG = 0) as H2 % notInZero by omega.
eapply list_prefix_inv in IH as [<- _]; try rewrite <- in_rev; eauto.
assert (count x StartG = 0) as H1 % notInZero by omega.
assert (count y0 StartG = 0) as H2 % notInZero by omega.
eapply list_prefix_inv in IH as [ <- _]; try rewrite <- in_rev; eauto.
assert (count x StartG = 0) as H1 % notInZero by omega.
assert (count y0 StartG = 0) as H2 % notInZero by omega.
eapply list_prefix_inv in IH as [<- _]; try rewrite <- in_rev; eauto.
Lemma listI : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall x, P [x]) -> (forall (x : A) (y : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (x :: l ++ [y])) -> forall l : list A, P l.
Lemma rev_palin x : x <<= StartG :: Sigma -> x = rev x -> count x StartG <= 1 -> rewt palin_G [StartG] x.
assert (x el StartG :: Sigma) by firstorder.
Lemma Start_fresh x : x <<= Sigma -> ~ StartG el x.
Lemma G_char x : x <<= Sigma -> x = rev x <-> L palin_G x.
